citations.narrative:
The larger outdoor portion of a sheltered run has a small hole in it (about 4 inches) with wire points sticking in where dogs
could touch them. Wire points could injure dogs. Ensure to maintain all surfaces free from sharp points to protect dogs
from injury.
***Correct by December 19, 2024.

The written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) states adult dogs will be vaccinated yearly for Parvovirus and Distemper.
Per records, adult dogs were last vaccinated for these in September 2023. Keeping adult dogs up to date on all required
vaccines helps protect all dogs and puppies from sickness. Ensure to keep the adult dogs up to date on each of their
vaccines as written in the PVC.
***Correct by January 3, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The larger outdoor portion of a sheltered run has a small hole in it (about 4 inches) with wire points sticking in where dogs 
could touch them. Wire points could injure dogs. Ensure to maintain all surfaces free from sharp points to protect dogs 
from injury.  
***Correct by December 19, 2024. 
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) states adult dogs will be vaccinated yearly for Parvovirus and Distemper. 
Per records, adult dogs were last vaccinated for these in September 2023. Keeping adult dogs up to date on all required 
vaccines helps protect all dogs and puppies from sickness. Ensure to keep the adult dogs up to date on each of their 
vaccines as written in the PVC.  
***Correct by January 3, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
